classes.name: type_index
classes.description: Wraps a type for use in a standard library container or other context requiring comparison or hashing.

constructors.name: type_index
constructors.description: Constructs a type_index object from a type.

functions.name: operator=
functions.description: Assigns a new type to the type_index object.

functions.name: hash_code
functions.description: Returns the hash code of the wrapped type.

functions.name: before
functions.description: Compares two type_index objects for ordering.

parameters.name: rhs
parameters.description: The type_index object to compare with.

functions.name: name
functions.description: Returns the mangled name of the wrapped type.
